content: learn how to create lori the cockatoo bird amigurumi with this free cockatoo crochet pattern this is an easy almost no sew crochet pattern perfect for beginners it is also very quick to make takes about 1 to 2 hours you can use any yarn to make it i made a small keychain mini cockatoo from sport weight cotton yarn and a bigger cockatoo from chenille super bulky plush yarn the pattern has a full video tutorial included on how to make this cute cockatoo bird amigurumi link to written pattern https //www mariskavos nl/free-cockatoo-crochet-pattern/ link to video https //youtu be/cgnnl-mjx4o
